main event: A deep orange object was observed in the sky over Goat Rock, Georgia, in April 1953.
interesting points: The object was seen changing colors rapidly from orange to pale blue to white., The object was observed on six to eight different occasions since September 1953., It always appears in the north quadrant and appears low on the horizon., Observers reported that the object moves in short straight lines and gains and loses altitude., The observers are described as honest, sincere, and reliable.
witness description: two observers sitting on a porch gazing at stars
